parameters.name: CallMethod
parameters.description: The method name. Default value: init.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region in which the server resides.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request. You do not need to specify this parameter. It is automatically obtained by the system.

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server that you want to unbind. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).

>  You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~141932~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
